title: If you have a concealed carry permit, is it okay to carry in city of wilmington parks and city of wilmington parking decks? Is it okay to store it in your car in city of wilmington parking decks?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2014/05/with-a-concealed-carry-permit-can-i-take-a-gun-into-a-city-park-or-parking-deck/
